item.title: How to scrape all links from a website
item.description: Simply copy-paste the following one-liner to Chrome Dev Tools. To limit the results, set the reg exp placeholder to contain some sensible value, or replace the function call with return value true. Array.prototype.slice.call( document.getElementsByTagName('a'), 0 ) .map(i => i.href) .filter(i => i.match('reg exp placeholder')) .forEach(i => console.log(i)) Here is an explanation for what it does: Selects all the elements on the document. Converts the HTMLCollection object returned by getElementsByTagName into an Array by using the Array.
